001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
005
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * This mixin interface indicates that the implementation is a {@link INodeItem}
016 * that may have both flag and model children.
017 */
018public interface IFeatureModelContainerItem extends IFeatureFlagContainerItem {
019
020  @Override
021  ModelContainer getModel();
022
023  @Override
024  default Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
025    return getModel().getModelItems();
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  default List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(QName name) {
030    return getModel().getModelItemsByName(name);
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Provides an abstract implementation of a lazy loaded model.
035   */
036  class ModelContainer
037      extends FlagContainer {
038    private final Map<QName, List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> modelItems;
039
040    /**
041     * Creates a new collection of flags and model items.
042     *
043     * @param flags
044     *          a mapping of flag name to a flag item
045     * @param modelItems
046     *          a mapping of model item name to a list of model items
047     */
048    protected ModelContainer(
049        @NonNull Map<QName, IFlagNodeItem> flags,
050        @NonNull Map<QName, List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> modelItems) {
051      super(flags);
052      this.modelItems = modelItems;
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Get the matching list of model items having the provided name.
057     *
058     * @param name
059     *          the name of the model items to retrieve
060     * @return a lisy of matching model items or {@code null} if no match was found
061     */
062    @NonNull
063    public List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(@NonNull QName name) {
064      List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> result = modelItems.get(name);
065      return result == null ? CollectionUtil.emptyList() : result;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Get all model items grouped by model item name.
070     *
071     * @return a collection of lists containg model items grouped by names
072     */
073    @SuppressWarnings("null")
074    @NonNull
075    public Collection<List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
076      return modelItems.values();
077    }
078  }
079}
